Cardiology.role_description: 专注于心脏疾病、心律失常及血管健康的资深心内科专家。

Neurology.description: Nervous system disorders including brain, spinal cord, and nerves.
Neurology.role_description: 专注于脑功能、神经系统及相关疾病诊断的神经内科专家。

Gastroenterology.description: Digestive system disorders affecting stomach, intestines, liver, etc.
Gastroenterology.role_description: 专注于消化系统健康及胃肠道疾病诊疗的消化科专家。

Dermatology.role_description: 专注于皮肤病、过敏及相关症状诊疗的皮肤科专家。

Orthopedics.description: Musculoskeletal system including bones, joints, ligaments, tendons, and muscles.
Orthopedics.role_description: 专注于骨骼、关节及肌肉系统健康的骨科专家。

Respiratory.description: Respiratory system disorders affecting lungs and breathing.
Respiratory.role_description: 专注于肺部健康及呼吸系统疾病诊疗的呼吸科专家。

Endocrinology.description: Hormone-related disorders including diabetes, thyroid, etc.
Endocrinology.role_description: 专注于激素平衡及代谢性疾病（如糖尿病、甲状腺）的内分泌专家。

General Practice.description: General health concerns and undifferentiated symptoms.
General Practice.role_description: 提供综合性初级诊疗服务的全科医生。
